name: inline-iptables
description: An iptables cookbook built to be flexible in it's application through attributes or wrapper recipes.
long_description: A recipe to manage iptables without impacting existing iptables rules or chains, and allowing individual inbound/outbound ports as well as port ranges to be managed with programmatic ease.

recipes.inline-iptables: A recipe to manage iptables without impacting existing iptables rules or chains, and allowing individual inbound/outbound ports as well as port ranges to be managed with programmatic ease.
